input: Anne is quiet. Anne is smart. Anne is white. Bob is cold. Bob is white. Fiona is blue. Fiona is quiet. Fiona is red. Gary is blue. Gary is cold. Gary is red. Gary is rough. Gary is smart. Gary is white. If someone is cold then they are white. White people are rough. If someone is quiet then they are white. Blue, cold people are red. Red, white people are quiet. If someone is rough then they are blue. All quiet, red people are smart. Question: Bob is smart.?
output:
universe u

constant obj : Type u

constant Anne : obj
constant Bob : obj
constant Fiona : obj
constant Gary : obj

constant Quiet : obj → Prop
constant Smart : obj → Prop
constant White : obj → Prop
constant Cold : obj → Prop
constant Blue : obj → Prop
constant Red : obj → Prop
constant Rough : obj → Prop

axiom T1 : Quiet Anne
axiom T2 : Smart Anne
axiom T3 : White Anne
axiom T4 : Cold Bob
axiom T5 : White Bob
axiom T6 : Blue Fiona
axiom T7 : Quiet Fiona
axiom T8 : Red Fiona
axiom T9 : Blue Gary
axiom T10 : Cold Gary
axiom T11 : Red Gary
axiom T12 : Rough Gary
axiom T13 : Smart Gary
axiom T14 : White Gary

axiom R1 : ∀ x : obj, Cold x → White x
axiom R2 : ∀ x : obj, White x → Rough x
axiom R3 : ∀ x : obj, Quiet x → White x
axiom R4 : ∀ x : obj, Blue x ∧ Cold x → Red x
axiom R5 : ∀ x : obj, Red x ∧ White x → Quiet x
axiom R6 : ∀ x : obj, Rough x → Blue x
axiom R7 : ∀ x : obj, Quiet x ∧ Red x → Smart x

theorem bob_is_smart : Smart Bob :=
begin
  apply R7,
  split,
  apply R5,
  split,
  apply R4,
  split,
  apply R6,
  apply R2,
  exact T5,
  exact T4,
  exact T5,
end

-- The answer is True
